sentences.sentence: He enjoyed little success when he ventured into business.
sentences.translation: 他在冒险涉足生意时很少成功。

sentences.sentence: "Don't ask," he said, whenever Ginny ventured to raise the subject.
sentences.translation: 每当金尼冒险提起这个话题时，他总是说∶“你不要问了。”

sentences.sentence: 'And if I say no?' she ventured.
sentences.translation: “那么我要是说不呢？”她试探说。
